comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content: 'The Mikado'....but what else? On the grounds of probability I'd say you're correct. Notice the 'three minstrels' with their mandolins(?) at the back, a prominent feature of the opera. The Mikado has always been an exceptionally popular opera for school performances.

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Definitely the Mikado and what a stunning photo?  This is such a beauty, thank you for putting it up.  I have it on CD and frequently listen to it when driving.  It was one of the first light opera's I was taken to and the memory is still as bright as it was on the night.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: I think they are just outside the door visible in this Streetview of the convent.

comment.author: 66489753@N07
comment._content: Dany, scumpa mea, revino! Sunt al tău! N-am să te părăsesc niciodată! Te iubesc! Mult! Te sărut mult, cu iubire! Tu ești Dumnezeul meu!
